member.name: T:System.Xml.Linq.DynamicXmlExtensions
member.summary: Provides the extension method for , allowing read-only dynamic API access over the underlying XML.

member.name: M:System.Xml.Linq.DynamicXmlExtensions.ToDynamic(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Converts the element into a dynamic object to use dotted and indexer notation for elements and attribtes, with built-in support for when casting the resulting values.
